ReportSection.title: End of Second Probationary Period - No Further Appointment
ReportSection.ReportItem:
This is to inform you that I will be recommending to the Faculty Evaluation Committee (FEC) that at the end of your second probationary period, no further appointment be offered to you. My recommendation is based on the following rationale:

{getText({$report_type}, TABLE, COMMENT, {$user_id}, 1, 0)}

Under Article A6.17.1 of Schedule A, you have a right to appear before FEC and contest the recommendation. It is advisable that you consult the Association of Academic Staff University of Alberta (AASUA) for advice.

Should you decide to contest the recommendation, the following information is to be included in your written submission to the FEC Chair, Simaan Abourizk by {getText({$report_type}, TABLE, FOLLOWUP_DATE, {$user_id}, 1, 0)}, with a copy to me, as Department Chair:
  • a statement advising FEC whether or not you will be appearing in person before FEC to present your case;
  • any material in response to my recommendation and any other material relevant to your case;
  • a list of names of persons who will attend the FEC hearing as your witnesses.

Materials submitted to the FEC Chair and myself should be submitted electronically, if feasible.

If you have any procedural questions, please contact the FEC Administrator, Catherine Pretzlaw, at enggdeanea@ualberta.ca.
